email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. Could you provide a freight quote and details on available vessels for this route?

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50/MT on a CFR basis. The laycan is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Peter Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market conditions. Could you consider revising the quote to USD 24.00/MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

We can adjust the freight rate to USD 24.50/MT, considering the current market. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Please let me know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

The revised rate of USD 24.50/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN STAR with the laycan of 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Kindly confirm the booking and provide the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for your confirmation. The booking for the OCEAN STAR is now confirmed. I will send over the booking confirmation and necessary documentation shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Peter
